FileFormatPrefs Class Reference

#include <FileFormatPrefs.h>

Inheritance diagram for FileFormatPrefs:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A PrefsPanel used to select file format preferences and to locate the MP3 encoding library. Now called 'Import/Export' in the preferences. Later we will rename this panel and source files.

Member Function Documentation

bool FileFormatPrefs::Apply (  )  [virtual]

Takes the settings from the dilaog and puts them into prefs. Most of the preferences are set by the ShuttleGui, but for some specially handled ones we need to do this ourselves.

Implements PrefsPanel.

void FileFormatPrefs::Populate (  )  [private]

Creates the dialog and its contents.

void FileFormatPrefs::PopulateOrExchange ( ShuttleGui &  S  )  [private]

This PopulateOrExchange function is a good example of mixing the fully automatic style of reading/writing from GUI to prefs with the partial form.

You'll notice that some of the Tie functions have Prefs identifiers in them and others don't.

void FileFormatPrefs::OnMP3FindButton ( wxCommandEvent &  evt  )  [private]

Opens a file-finder dialog so that the user can tell us where the MP3 library is.
